#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		string x;
		int k;
		cin>>x>>k;
		int ans = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < x.size(); ++i)
			ans = (ans*10 + (x[i]-'0'))%k;
		if(ans == 0)
			cout<<"YES\n";
		else
			cout<<"NO\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
